/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades painted in a palette of whites, grays, and browns. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. Power lines crisscross above, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
